full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/18/2023 Form G-135a Agency Name Check (Rev. 10-1-65) Office Boston, Mass. UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE File No. Immigration and Naturalization Service A-10 294 862(IB)ACM 150 Tremont St., Boston, Mass. 02111 DIRECTOR, FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION, Date May 10, 1966 DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE, Washington, D. C. 20537 Attention: IDENTIFICATION DIVISION Please furnish a copy of any criminal record shown in the fingerprint records of your Bureau concerning the following person. Fingerprints Attached Unavailable FBI Ident. Number (LAST NAME) (FIRST NAME) (MIDDLE NAME) DATE OF BIRTH PRESENT NATIONALITY MAR Doo July 15, 1908 China PLACE OF BIRTH MARITAL STATUS OTHER NAMES USED (Maiden name, names by former marriages, former names changed legally Kwangtung, k China SINGLE WIDOW(ER) or otherwise, aliases, nicknames, etc. Specify which, and show dates used.) MALE FEMALE MARRIED DIVORCED MAR Au-Sang; MAR Gong-Doo HEIGHT WEIGHT COLOR COLOR IDENTIFYING MARKS EYES HAIR 5'4" 125 brown black - IF MARRIED, WIDOWED, OR DIVORCED, GIVE FULL NAME AND DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH OF SPOUSE OR FORMER SPOUSE. INCLUDE WIFE'S MAIDEN NAME. GIVE DATES AND PLACES OF ALL MARRIAGES OR DIVORCES. WONG Lai Yung, born October 1909 in Tung Hing Village, Toyshan, China, married subject on December 27, 1927 in Lung Shing Village, China. PARENTS NAMES (Last name) (First name) DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH (If known) ADDRESS Father MA Gwoon Gwoon China deceased Mother WONG Shee 11 11 ORGANIZATIONS (Include any societies, clubs, etc., with which now or previously affiliated) Kuomintang since 1926 (the Nationalist Party) RESIDENCE LAST (7) YEARS (Street & No., RFD, etc.) (City, state and country) FROM TO 2 Warrenton St. (3rd floor), Boston, Mass. (will soon move to 2/1966 Date 69 Mott St., New York, N.Y. (Apt. 11) 32 Oxford St. , Boston) 10/1958 2/1966 EMPLOYMENT LAST (5) (7) YEARS (Employer's name) (Number, street, city, state) FROM TO Bamboo Hut, Lexington, Mass. 3/8/66 Date Four K Laundry, 9 Foxhurst Rd., Baldwin, N.Y. 1965 Broadway Pressing Co., 5060 Broadway, New York, N.Y. ) Asia Shirt Pressing Corp., 509 46th St., , Brooklyn, N.Y.) 1963 1964 Quon Bing Tom (restaurant), 157 Belmont Ave., Newark, N.J. 1962 LAST ADMISSION TO U.S. (Date, port and status) PRIOR ENTRIES AND DEPARTURES (Dates and ports or if numerous, list years when previously in U.S.) 4/30/55, Boston, Mass. ; crewman PREVIOUS REPORTS FURNISHED BY FBI: U.S. PASSPORT NO.
